11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.tasks;
12  
13  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.FormatterAdvice;
14  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.FormatterStrategyDispatcher;
15  
16  import java.util.SortedSet;
17  import java.util.TreeSet;
18  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
19  import java.util.logging.Level;
20  import java.util.logging.Logger;
21  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
22  
23  import javax.swing.text.BadLocationException;
24  import javax.swing.text.Element;
25  import javax.swing.text.JTextComponent;
26  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
27  
28  import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
29  import org.netbeans.api.editor.EditorRegistry;
30  import org.netbeans.api.editor.mimelookup.MimeRegistration;
31  import org.netbeans.spi.editor.document.OnSaveTask;
32  import org.openide.text.NbDocument;
33  import org.openide.util.Exceptions;
34  
35  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings;
36  
37  public class FormatOnSaveTask implements OnSaveTask {
38  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(FormatOnSaveTask.class.getName());
39  
40  	private final ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
41  
42  	private final Context context;
43  
44  	private FormatOnSaveTask(Context context) {
45  		this.context = context;
46  	}
47  
48  	public SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> getChangedLines(StyledDocument doc) {
49  		final SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements = new TreeSet<>();
50  		Element root = context.getModificationsRootElement();
51  		for (int i = 0; i < root.getElementCount(); i++) {
52  			Element e = root.getElement(i);
53  			int startOffset = e.getStartOffset();
54  			int endOffset = e.getEndOffset();
55  
56  			int startLine = NbDocument.findLineNumber(doc, startOffset);
57  			int endLine = NbDocument.findLineNumber(doc, endOffset);
58  			// format at least one line
59  			if (startLine == endLine) {
60  				endLine = startLine + 1;
61  			}
62  			int start = NbDocument.findLineOffset(doc, startLine) - 1;
63  			int end = NbDocument.findLineOffset(doc, endLine);
64  
65  			try {
66  				log.finest(String.format("Offset %s-%s -> Line %s-%s -> Offset %s-%s", startOffset, endOffset, startLine, endLine, start, end));
67  				log.log(Level.FINEST, "\n\"{0}\"\n", doc.getText(start, end - start));
68  			} catch (BadLocationException ex) {
69  				Exceptions.printStackTrace(ex);
70  			}
71  
72  			changedElements.add(Pair.of(start, end));
73  		}
74  		return changedElements;
75  	}
76  
77  	@Override
78  	public void performTask() {
79  		final StyledDocument styledDoc = (StyledDocument) this.context.getDocument();
80  		Preferences pref = Settings.getActivePreferences(styledDoc);
81  
82  		final boolean enableSaveAction = pref.getBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_SAVEACTION, false);
83  		if (enableSaveAction) {
84  			SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements = null;
85  
86  			final boolean modifiedLinesOnly = pref.getBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_SAVEACTION_MODIFIEDLINESONLY, false);
87  			if (modifiedLinesOnly && Settings.FEATURE_FORMAT_CHANGED_LINES_ONLY) {
88  				changedElements = getChangedLines(styledDoc);
89  			}
90  
91  			JTextComponent editor = EditorRegistry.findComponent(styledDoc);
92  			int caret = (null != editor) ? editor.getCaretPosition() : -1;
93  
94  			FormatterStrategyDispatcher.getInstance().format(new FormatterAdvice(styledDoc, changedElements, caret, editor));
95  		}
96  	}
97  
98  	@Override
99  	public void runLocked(Runnable run) {
100 		if (run != null) {
101 			lock.lock();
102 
103 			try {
104 				run.run();
105 			} finally {
106 				lock.unlock();
107 			}
108 		}
109 	}
110 
111 	@Override
112 	public boolean cancel() {
113 		return true;
114 	}
115 
116 	@MimeRegistration(mimeType = "text/x-java", service = OnSaveTask.Factory.class, position = 1500)
117 	public static final class FactoryImpl implements Factory {
118 		@Override
119 		public OnSaveTask createTask(Context context) {
120 			return new FormatOnSaveTask(context);
121 		}
122 	}
123 }
